articles.title: Nipah Virus Outbreak Has Asia on High Alert Amid Deaths in India - ScienceAlert
articles.description: An outbreak of the deadly Nipah virus in India has put many countries in Asia on high alert, given the fatality rate in humans can be between 40% and 75%.
articles.content:
An outbreak of the deadly Nipah virus in India has put many countries in Asia on high alert, given the fatality rate in humans can be between 40% and 75%.
